item.title: Using an autoencoder to generate an image of a coin
item.description: Introduction For the BWKI (Bundeswettbewerb KÃ¼nstliche Intelligenz - engl.: federal artificial intelligence competition) Hackathon we were given data by the Badisches Landesmuseum to use and create our own AI related idea and prototype over a weekend. Together with a friend we decided to take a dataset containing images of old coins and train an AI to generate new images. Cleaning the data The images we got could contain multiple coins at once in different positions so we decided to first cut out all circle shaped objects using a python script and then manually go through each image to verify that it’s indeed a coin.
